name: FLORIDA FARM BUREAU FEDERATION
sampleDescriptions: renegotiations of the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)- maintaining inclusion of an antidumping trade remedy for seasonal and perishable products.
HR. 4760 - Securing America's Future Act, which includes agricultural guestworker program reform.
Senate companion bill of HR. 4667 - emergency supplemental funding for disaster-stricken areas (TX, FL, PR) - provided $90B in disaster aid with $3.8B devoted to agricultural assistance.  Senate bill
2018 Farm Bill development, including Title 1 crop insurance reforms, Specialty Crop Block grant funding, and maintaining standing research initiatives
Electronic Logging Device (ELD) mandate waiver for agricultural commodities
